name: Bigweld: A Love Story
description:
MEET THE MAN OF YOUR DREAMS ERR... I MEAN BIGWELD! IN THIS FANTASTIC DATING SIMULATOR WITH AMAZING GRAPHICS AND WELL WRITTEN DIALOGUE! THE GAME IS SO REAL THAT YOU, YEAH YOU, ARE PART OF THIS DIGITAL WORLD.  (there's 10 endings...can you get them all?)

It took 1 discord server and a computer to make this possible.
